tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE DisplacedIndividuals (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    needs TEXT,
    contact VARCHAR(20),
    registration_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE displaced_individuals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE displaced_families (
    family_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    head_of_family VARCHAR(255),
    total_members INT,
    address VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE displaced_individuals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE displaced_families (
    family_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    head_of_family VARCHAR(255),
    total_members INT,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    assistance_needed TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE aid_organizations (
    org_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    org_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    contact_number VARCHAR(20),
    services_provided TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE DisplacedIndividuals (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  contact VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE DisplacedFamilies (
  family_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  head_of_family_id INT,
  address VARCHAR(200),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  country VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AidOrganizations (
  org_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  org_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  phone VARCHAR(20) UNIQUE
);

CREATE TABLE AidRequests (
  request_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  family_id INT,
  aid_org_id INT,
  request_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE DisplacedIndividuals (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15),
  family_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE AidRequests (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  request_description TEXT,
  requested_by VARCHAR(50),
  request_date DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20),
  organization_id INT
);
